author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tiruchengode Municipality has managed to repay debts to the tune of Rs. 5 crore, said Pon Saraswathi, its chairperson.

At the regular municipal council meeting held here on Thursday, Ms. Saraswathi said that the municipality had to repay debts to the tune of Rs. 7.5 crore when she assumed charge about four years ago. The municipality had already repaid Rs. 5 crore.

The meeting adopted a resolution thanking the Chief Minister for earmarking 50 per cent seats in the local bodies to women.

Ms. Saraswathi thanked the government for sanctioning two primary health centres in wards 1 and 10.
title: ‘Tiruchengode Municipality repaid debts’
